Title: Provides training to staff members accepting registrations, issuing licenses or conducting inspections of child day care homes, programs or facilities on the recognition of controlled substances
Summary: Provides training to staff members accepting registrations, issuing licenses or conducting inspections of child day care homes, programs or facilities on the detection of controlled substances.
LawCode: Amd ยง390-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to training certain staff accepting registrations, issuing licenses or conducting inspections of child day care homes, programs or facilities on the recognition of controlled substances
